description: A policy to be applied to this contract

disabled.description: set to true to disable this rule

embedded.description: meant to be used to embed the policy in the contract

ref.description: policy reference, it might be in URI format.

requirements.description: List of requirements this policy contributes to satisfy

selector.description:
rules to select a material or materials to be validated by the policy.
 If none provided, the whole statement will be injected to the policy

with.description:
optional arguments for policies. Multivalued arguments can be set through multiline strings or comma separated values. It will be
 parsed and passed as an array value to the policy engine.
